alert.note: Alert for Butler; Colfax; Cuming; Seward; Thurston (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 9:20PM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNINGS, WINTER STORM WARNINGS, AND WINTER WEATHER ADVISORIES IN EFFECT FOR MOST OF EASTERN NEBRASKA AND SOUTHWEST IOWA... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Butler, Colfax, Cuming, Thurston, and Seward Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
